alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:48AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water Levels Expected This Week... Rain continues over the northeast Brooks Range east of the Dalton Highway. Rainfall totals of 1 to 1.5 inches have fallen from Monday evening through early Wednesday afternoon. Additional rainfall up to one third of an inch is expected through Thursday night. Runoff from this rainfall and melting of the remaining snowpack will cause rivers draining the northeast Brooks Range to rise to bankfull levels in some locations through Friday. This includes the Canning, Hulahula, Okpilak and Kongakut Rivers. The high water will cover gravel bars and cause increased erosion in some locations. People recreating along these rivers are encouraged to monitor water levels. Water levels will also rise on the Sag River, but remain below bankfull.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range
